resources.string: We comply with the law and will comply with all requests, block access and release logs at the request of government authorities. Our VPN is not for dirty deeds

The main expense of VPN and proxy services is servers, or rather the traffic passing through them. We decided to make it possible to use VPN completely free and without advertising if you allow other users to use you as a VPN/Proxy. It is completely safe and your personal data remains safe, we will only allow other users to bypass the restrictions through you, but not to invade your data in any way. We will allow our clients to spend your traffic in an amount of no more than 10% of how much you spend ours.
I want your traffic for free and I will give mine in return. I allow other users to use my connection
I don\'t want to share traffic, I\'d rather buy a subscription
Buy a subscription or change mode
We can provide you with traffic for free if you are ready to provide your traffic too
We do not invade your data in any way, your privacy is preserved
